availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in Russellville, Logan County, Kentucky on November 1, 1830. Obtained his medical degree from the University of Pennsylvania in 1854. Worked as a physician in Logan County. married Mary C. Caldwell on June 20, 1854. Died on January 19, 1915 in Logan County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "George Richard Bibb (1830 - 1915)," Memorial #75141029, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=75141029&ref=acom (accessed June 26, 2017).; "Graduates of the University of Pennsylvania," The American Journal of the Medical Sciences Vol. 28 (1854), 293; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 148.
